Title: Eyes Without a Face
Writer: Jean Redon (novel), Pierre Boileau (adaptation), Thomas Narcejac (adaptation), Jean Redon (adaptation), Claude Sautet (adaptation), Pierre Gascar (dialogue)
Actors: Pierre Brasseur, Alida Valli, Juliette Mayniel, Alexandre Rignault
Plot: A surgeon causes an accident which leaves his daughter disfigured, and goes to extremes to give her a new face.
